GP12vipce_au:7593: puruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi cāṣṭa ca |
GP12vipce_au:7594: ye 'mṛtatvam anuprāptā babhror devāvṛdhād api || ViP_4,13.4 ||
GP12vipce_au:7595: mahābhojas tv atidharmātmā tasyānvaye bhojā mārtikāvatā babhūvuḥ ||
GP12vipce_au:7596: vṛṣṇeḥ sumitro yudhājic ca putrāv abhūtām |
GP12vipce_au:7597: tataś cānamitraśinī tathānamitrān nighno nighnasya prasenasatrājitau |
GP12vipce_au:7599: ekadā tv ambhonidhitīrasaṃśrayaḥ sūryaṃ satrājitas tuṣṭāva tanmanaskatayā ca bhāsvān abhiṣṭūyamāno 'gratas tasya tasthau |
GP12vipce_au:7600: aspaṣṭamūrtidharaṃ cainam ālokya satrājitaḥ sūryam āha |
GP12vipce_au:7601: yathaiva vyomni vahnipiṇḍopamam aham apaśyaṃ tathaivādyāgrato gatam apy atra na kiṃcid bhagavatā prasādīkṛtaṃ viśeṣam upalakṣayāmi ||
GP12vipce_au:7602: ityevam ukte bhagavatā sūryeṇa nijakaṇṭhād unmucya syamantakanāmā mahāmaṇir avatāryaikānte nyastaḥ || ViP_4,13.6 ||
GP12vipce_au:7603: tatas tam ātāmrojjvalahrasvavapuṣam īṣadāpiṅgalanayanam ādityam adrākṣīt |
GP12vipce_au:7606: sa ca tad eva maṇiratnam ayācata |
GP12vipce_au:7607: sa cāpi tasmai tad dattvā viyati svadhiṣṇyam āruroha || ViP_4,13.7 ||
GP12vipce_au:7608: satrājito 'py amalamaṇiratnasanāthakaṇṭhatayā sūrya iva tejobhir aśeṣadigantarāṇy udbhāsayan dvārakāṃ viveśa || ViP_4,13.8 ||
GP12vipce_au:7609: dvārakāvāsijanapadas tu tam āyāntam avekṣya bhagavantam ādipuruṣaṃ puruṣottamam avanibhārāvataraṇāyāṃśena mānuṣarūpadhāriṇaṃ praṇipatyāha |
GP12vipce_au:7610: bhagavan bhagavantam ayaṃ nūnaṃ draṣṭum āyāty āditya ity ākarṇya prahasya ca tān āha |
GP12vipce_au:7611: bhagavān nāyam ādityaḥ satrājito yam ādityadattaṃ syamanatakākhyaṃ mahāmaṇiṃ bibhrad atropayāti
GP12vipce_au:7612: tad enaṃ visrabdhāḥ paśyata ity uktās te yayuḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7613: sa ca taṃ syamantakākhyaṃ mahāmaṇim ātmaniveśane cakre || ViP_4,13.9 ||
GP12vipce_au:7614: pratidinaṃ ca tan maṇiratnapravaram aṣṭau kanakabhārān sravati |
GP12vipce_au:7616: acyuto 'pi tad ratnam ugrasenasya bhūpater yogyam etad iti lipsāṃ cakre |
GP12vipce_au:7618: satrājito apy acyuto mām etad yācayiṣyatīty avagataratnalobhaḥ svabhrātre prasenāya tad ratnam dattavān |
GP12vipce_au:7619: tac ca śucinā dhriyamāṇam aśeṣam eva suvarṇasrāvādikaṃ guṇam utpādayati |
GP12vipce_au:7620: anyathā ya enaṃ dhārayati tam eva hantīty |
GP12vipce_au:7621: asāv api prasenaḥ syamantakena kaṇṭhāsaktenāśvam āruhyāṭavyāṃ mṛgayām agacchat |
GP12vipce_au:7623: sāśvaṃ ca taṃ nihatya siṃho 'py amalamaṇiratnam āsyāgreṇādāya gantum
GP12vipce_au:7624: udyata ṛkṣādhipatinā jāmbavatā dṛṣṭo ghātitaś ca |
GP12vipce_au:7625: jāmbavān apy amalaṃ tan maṇiratnam ādāya svabilaṃ praviveśa |
GP12vipce_au:7626: sukumārasaṃjñāya ca bālakāya krīḍanakam akarot || ViP_4,13.12 ||
GP12vipce_au:7627: anāgacchati ca tasmin prasene kṛṣṇo maṇiratnam abhilaṣitavān |
GP12vipce_au:7628: na ca prāptavān nūnam etad asya karmety akhila eva yadulokaḥ parasparaṃ karṇākarṇy'kathayat viditalokāpavādavṛttāntaś ca bhagavān yadusainyaparivāraḥ prasenāśvapadavīm anusasāra |
GP12vipce_au:7629: dadarśa cāśvasametaṃ prasenaṃ nihataṃ siṃhenākhilajanapadamadhye siṃhapadadarśanakṛtapariśuddhiḥ siṃhapadam anusasāra || ViP_4,13.14 ||
GP12vipce_au:7630: ṛkṣavinihataṃ ca siṃham apy alpe bhūmibhāge dṛṣṭvā tataś ca tadratnagauravād ṛkṣasyāpi padāny anuyayau |
GP12vipce_au:7631: giritaṭe ca sakalam eva yadusainyam avasthāpya tatpadānusārī ṛkṣabilaṃ praviveśa |
GP12vipce_au:7632: ardhapraviṣṭaś ca dhātryāḥ sukumārakam ullāpayantyā vāṇīṃ śuśrāva |
GP12vipce_au:7633: siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7634: sukumāraka mā rodīs tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ || ViP_4,13.15 ||
GP12vipce_au:7635: ity ākarṇyalabdhasyamantakodantaḥ praviṣṭaḥ kumārakrīḍanakīkṛtaṃ ca dhātryā haste tejobhir jājvalyamānaṃ syamantakaṃ dadarśa || ViP_4,13.16 ||
GP12vipce_au:7636: taṃ ca syamantakābhilāṣicakṣuṣam apūrvapuruṣam āgataṃ samavekṣya dhātrī trāhi trāhīti vyājahāra tadārtanādaśravaṇānantaraṃ cāmarṣapūrṇahṛdayaḥ sa jāmbavān ājagāma |
GP12vipce_au:7637: tayoś ca parasparam yudhyator dvayor yuddham ekaviṃśatidināny abhavat |
GP12vipce_au:7638: te ca yadusainikās tatra saptāṣṭa dināni tanniṣkrāntim udīkṣamāṇās tasthuḥ
GP12vipce_au:7639: aniṣkramamāṇe ca madhuripāv asāv avaśyam atra bile 'tyantaṃ nāśam āpto bhaviṣyaty anyathā tasya jīvataḥ katham etāvanti dināni śatrujaye vyākṣepo
GP12vipce_au:7640: bhavatīti kṛtādhyavasāyā dvārakām āgatya hataḥ kṛṣṇa iti kathayām āsuḥ ||
GP12vipce_au:7641: tadbāndhavāś ca tatkālocitam akhilam uparatakriyākalāpaṃ cakruḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7644: nirjitaś ca bhagavatā jāmbavān praṇipatyāha V vyājahāra |
GP12vipce_au:7645: asurasurayakṣagandharvarākṣasādibhir apy akhilair bhagavān na jetuṃ śakyaḥ
GP12vipce_au:7646: kim utāvanigocarair alpavīryair narair narāvayavabhūtaiś ca tiryagyonyanusṛtibhiḥ kiṃ punar asmadvidhaiḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7647: avaśyaṃ bhagavato 'smatsvāmino nārāyaṇasya sakalajagatparāyaṇasyāṃśena bhagavatā bhavitavyam ity uktas tasmai bhagavān akhilāvanibhārāvatāram ācacakṣe |
GP12vipce_au:7649: sa ca praṇipatyainaṃ punar api prasādya jāmbavatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ gṛhāgamanārghyabhūtāṃ grāhayām āsa || ViP_4,13.21 ||
GP12vipce_au:7650: syamantakamaṇim apy asau praṇipatya tasmai pradadau |
GP12vipce_au:7651: acyuto 'py atipraṇatāt tasmād agrāhyam api tan maṇiratnam ātmasaṃśodhanāya jagrāha || ViP_4,13.22
GP12vipce_au:7653: bhagavadāgamanodbhūtaharṣotkarṣasya dvārakāvāsijanasya kṛṣṇāvalokanāt tatkṣaṇam evātipariṇatavayaso 'pi navayauvanam ivābhavat |
GP12vipce_au:7654: ānakadundubhiṃ ca diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti sakalayādavāḥ striyaś ca sabhājayām āsuḥ
GP12vipce_au:7655: bhagavān api yathānubhūtam aśeṣayādavasamāje yathāvad ācacakṣe |
GP12vipce_au:7656: syamantakaṃ ca satrājitāya dattvā mithyābhiśastiviśuddhim avāpa ||
GP12vipce_au:7658: satrājito 'pi mayāsyābhūtamalinam āropitam iti jātasaṃtrāsaḥ svasutāṃ satyabhāmāṃ bhagavate bhāryāṃ dadau |
GP12vipce_au:7659: tāṃ cākrūrakṛtavarmaśatadhanvapramukhā yādavāḥ pūrvaṃ varayāṃ āsuḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7660: tatas tatpradānād avajñātam ivātmānaṃ manyamānāḥ satrājite vairānubandhaṃ cakruḥ || ViP_4,13.24
GP12vipce_au:7662: ayam atidurātmā satrājito yo 'smābhir bhavatā ca abhyarthito 'py ātmajām asmān bhavantaṃ cāvigaṇayya kṛṣṇāya dattavān |
GP12vipce_au:7663: tad alam anena jīvatā ghātayitvainaṃ tan mahāratnaṃ tvayā kiṃ na gṛhyate |
GP12vipce_au:7664: vayam abhyupapatsyāmo yady acyutas tavopari vairānubandhaṃ kariṣyatīti ||
GP12vipce_au:7665: evam uktas tathety asāv apy āha |
GP12vipce_au:7666: jatugṛhadagdhānāṃ pāṇḍutanayānāṃ viditaparamārtho 'pi bhagavān duryodhanaprayatnaśaithilyakaraṇārtham ānukūlyakaraṇāya vāraṇāvataṃ gataḥ || ViP_4,13.26 ||
GP12vipce_au:7667: gate ca tasmin suptam eva satrājitaṃ śatadhanvā jaghāna maṇiratnaṃ cādade
GP12vipce_au:7668: pitṛvadhāmarṣapūrṇā ca satyabhāmā śīghraṃ syandanam ārūḍhā vāraṇāvataṃ gatvā bhagavate 'haṃ pratipāditety akṣāntimatā śatadhanvanāsmatpitā
GP12vipce_au:7672: tad ālocya yad atra yuktaṃ tat kriyatām iti kṛṣṇam āha || ViP_4,13.27 ||
GP12vipce_au:7673: tayā caivam uktaḥ parituṣṭāntaḥkaraṇo 'pi kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām amarṣatāmralocanaḥ prāha |
GP12vipce_au:7676: na hy anullaṅghya varapādapaṃ tatkṛtanīḍāśrayiṇo vihaṃgā vadhyante |
GP12vipce_au:7677: tad alam atyartham amunāsmatpurataḥ śokapreritavākyaparikareṇety uktvā dvārakām abhyetya baladevam ekānte vāsudevaḥ prāha |
GP12vipce_au:7680: tadubhayavināśāt tan maṇiratnam āvābhyāṃ sāmānyaṃ bhaviṣyati ||
GP12vipce_au:7681: tad uttiṣṭhāruhyatāṃ rathaḥ śatadhanvanidhanāyodyamaṃ kurv ity abhihitas tatheti samanvicchitavān
GP12vipce_au:7682: kṛtodyogau ca tāv ubhāv upalabhya śatadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇam upetya pārṣṇipūraṇakarmanimittam acodayat |
GP12vipce_au:7684: nāhaṃ balabhadravāsudevābhyāṃ saha virodhāyālam ity uktaś cākrūram acodayat |
GP12vipce_au:7686: na hi kaścid bhagavatā pādaprahāraparikampitajagattrayeṇāsurapuravanitāvaidhavyakāriṇā prabalaripucakrāpratihatacakreṇa cakriṇā madamuditanayanāvalokitāribalaviśātanenātiguruvairi vāraṇāpakarṣaṇāviṣkṛtamahimorusīreṇa sīriṇā ca saha sakalajagadvandyānām
GP12vipce_au:7687: amaravarāṇām api yoddhuṃ samarthaḥ kim utāhaṃ tadanyataḥ śaraṇam abhilaṣyatām || ViP_4,13.29
GP12vipce_au:7689: yady asmatparitrāṇāsamarthaṃ bhavān ātmānam avagacchati tad ayam asmanmaṇiḥ saṃgṛhya rakṣyatām ityuktaḥ so 'py āha |
GP12vipce_au:7690: yady antāyām apy avasthāyāṃ na kasmaicid bhavān kathayiṣyati tad aham enaṃ grahīṣyāmīti |
GP12vipce_au:7691: tathety ukte cākrūras tan maṇiratnaṃ jagrāha || ViP_4,13.30 ||
GP12vipce_au:7693: śaibyasugrīvameghapuṣpabalāhakāśvacatuṣṭayayuktarathāvasthitau baladevavāsudevau tam anuprayātau sā ca vaḍavā śatayojanapramāṇamārgam atītya punar api vāhyamānā mithilāvanoddeśe prāṇān utsasarja
GP12vipce_au:7694: śatadhanvāpi tāṃ parityajya padātir evādravat || ViP_4,13.32 ||
GP12vipce_au:7696: tāvad atraiva syandane bhavatā stheyam aham enam adhamācāraṃ padātinam anugamya yāvad ghātayāmi
GP12vipce_au:7698: naite 'śvā bhavatemaṃ bhūmibhāgam ullaṅghya neyāḥ || ViP_4,13.33 ||
GP12vipce_au:7699: tathety uktvā balabhadro ratha eva tasthau |
GP12vipce_au:7700: kṛṣṇo 'pi dvikrośamātraṃ bhūmibhāgam anusṛtya dūrasthitasyaiva cakraṃ kṣiptvā śatadhanvanaḥ śiraś ciccheda |
GP12vipce_au:7701: taccharīrāmbarādiṣu ca bahuprakāram anviṣyann api syamantakaṃ maṇiṃ nāvāpa yadā tadopagamya balabhadram āha |
GP12vipce_au:7705: dhik tvāṃ yas tvam evam arthalipsur etac ca te bhrātṛtvān marṣaye |
GP12vipce_au:7707: na me dvārakayā na bandhubhiḥ kāryam alam ebhir mamāgrato 'līkaśapathair
GP12vipce_au:7708: ity ākṣipya taṃ kathaṃcit prasādyamāno 'pi na tasthau |
GP12vipce_au:7710: janakaś cārghyapūrvakam enaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa |
GP12vipce_au:7713: yāvac ca janakarājagṛhe balabhadro 'vatasthe tāvad dhārtarāṣṭro duryodhanas tatsakāśād gadāśikṣām aśikṣata |
GP12vipce_au:7714: varṣatrayānte ca babhrūgrasenaprabhṛtibhir yādavair na tad ratnaṃ kṛṣṇenāpahṛtam iti kṛtāvagatibhir videhapurīṃ gatvā baladevaḥ saṃpratyāyya dvārakām ānītaḥ || ViP_4,13.35 ||
GP12vipce_au:7716: savanagatau hi kṣatriyavaiśyau nighnan brahmahā bhavatīty ato dīkṣākavacaṃ praviṣṭa eva tasthau
GP12vipce_au:7717: dviṣaṣṭivarṣāṇy evaṃ tanmaṇiprabhāvāt tatropasargadurbhikṣamarakādikaṃ nābhūt || ViP_4,13.36
GP12vipce_au:7718: athākrūrapakṣīyair bhojaiḥ śatrughne sātvatasya prapautre vyāpādite bhojaiḥ sahākrūro dvārakām apahāyāpakrāntaḥ || ViP_4,13.37 ||
GP12vipce_au:7721: kim yad idam ekadaiva pracuropadravāgamanam etad ālocyatām || ViP_4,13.38
GP12vipce_au:7723: asyākrūrasya pitā śvaphalko yatra yatrābhūt tatra tatra durbhikṣamarakānāvṛṣtyādikaṃ nābhūt kāśīrājasya viṣaye 'tyantānāvṛṣṭyāṃ śvaphalko 'nīyata |
GP12vipce_au:7725: kāśīrājapatnyāś ca garbhe kanyāpūrvam āsīt || ViP_4,13.40 ||
GP12vipce_au:7727: evaṃ ca tasya garbhasya dvādaśa varṣāṇy aniṣkrāmato yayuḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7728: kāśīrājaś ca garbhasthāṃ tām ātmajām āha |
GP12vipce_au:7729: putri kasmān na jāyase niṣkramyatām āsyaṃ te draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ svakāṃ ca mātaraṃ kim iti ciraṃ kleśayiṣyasīty ukte garbhasthaiva vyājahāra |
GP12vipce_au:7730: tāta yady ekaikāṃ gāṃ dine dine brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchasi tad aham anyais tribhir varṣair asmād garbhād avaśyaṃ niṣkramiṣyāmīti |
GP12vipce_au:7731: etac ca tadvacanam ākarṇya rājā dine dine brāhmaṇāya gāṃ prādāt |
GP12vipce_au:7733: tatas tasyāḥ pitā gāndinīti nāma cakāra |
GP12vipce_au:7734: tāṃ ca gāndinīṃ kanyāṃ śvaphalkāya priyopakāriṇe gṛhāgatāyārghabhūtāṃ prādāt || ViP_4,13.41
GP12vipce_au:7737: katham asminn apakrānte marakadurbhikṣādyupadravā na bhaviṣyanti |
GP12vipce_au:7738: tad ayam ānīyatām ity alam atiguṇavaty aparādhānveṣaneneti || ViP_4,13.43
GP12vipce_au:7739: yaduvṛddhasyāndhakasyaitad vacanam ākarṇya keśavograsenabalabhadrapurogamair yadubhiḥ kṛtāparādhatitikṣābhavam abhayaṃ dattvā śvāphalkiḥ svapuram ānītaḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7740: tatra cāgatamātra eva tasya tatsthasya maṇer anubhāvad anāvṛṣṭimarakadurbhikṣavyālādyupadravaḥ śaśāma |
GP12vipce_au:7742: svalpam etat kāraṇaṃ yad ayaṃ gāndinyāṃ śvaphalkenākrūro jātaḥ |
GP12vipce_au:7744: tan nūnam asya sakāśe sa mahāmaṇiḥ syamantakākhyas tiṣṭhati |
GP12vipce_au:7746: ayam api ca yajñād anantaram anyat kratvantaraṃ anantaram ca tasmād yajñāntaraṃ yajatīti |
GP12vipce_au:7747: alpopādānaṃ cāsyā saṃśayam atrāsau varamaṇis tiṣṭhatīti kṛtādhyavasāyo
GP12vipce_au:7749: tatra copaviṣṭeṣv akhileṣu yādaveṣu pūrvaprayojanam upanyasya paryavasite ca tasmin prasaṅgāgataparihāsakathām akrūreṇa saha kṛtvā janārdanas tam akrūram āha || ViP_4,13.46 ||
GP12vipce_au:7750: dānapate jānīma eva vayaṃ yathā śatadhanvanā tad akhilajagatsārabhūtaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ bhavataḥ samarpitaṃ tad etad rāṣṭropakārakaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhatīti |
GP12vipce_au:7751: tiṣṭhatu sarva eva vayaṃ tatprabhāvaphalabhujaḥ kiṃ tv eṣa balabhadro
GP12vipce_au:7752: 'smān āśaṅkitavāṃs tad asmatprītaye darśayety abhihitaḥ saratnaḥ so
GP12vipce_au:7754: kim atrānuṣṭheyam anyathā ced bravīmy ahaṃ tat kevalāmbaratirodhānam anviṣyanto ratnam etad drakṣyantīty anveṣaṇaṃ na kṣemam iti saṃcintya tam akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ nārāyaṇam āhākrūraḥ bhagavan mamaitat syamantakaratnaṃ śatadhanvanā samarpitam || ViP_4,13.48
GP12vipce_au:7755: apagate ca tasminn adya śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhagavān māṃ yācayiṣyatīti etāvantaṃ kālam atikṛcchreṇādhārayam
GP12vipce_au:7756: tasya ca dhāraṇakleśenāham aśeṣopabhogeṣv asaṅgimānaso na vedmi svasukhakalām api || ViP_4,13.49
GP12vipce_au:7757: etāvanmātram apy aśeṣarāṣṭropakārī dhārayituṃ na śaknotīti māṃ bhavān maṃsyata ity ātmanā na coditam || ViP_4,13.50 ||
GP12vipce_au:7758: tad idaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ gṛhyatām icchayā yasyābhimataṃ tasya samarpyatām |
GP12vipce_au:7760: tataś ca niṣkrāmya syamantakamaṇiṃ tasmin yadusamāje mumoca |
GP12vipce_au:7761: muktamātre ca tenātikāntyā tad akhilam āsthānam uddyotitam || ViP_4,13.52
GP12vipce_au:7763: sa eṣa maṇir yaḥ śatadhanvanāsmākaṃ samarpito yasyāyaṃ sa enaṃ gṛhṇātv iti |
GP12vipce_au:7764: tam ālokya sarvayādavānāṃ sādhu sādhv iti vismitavacasāṃ vāco 'śrūyanta |
GP12vipce_au:7765: tam ālokyamamāyam acyutenaiva sāmānyaḥ samanvicchita iti balabhadraḥ saspṛho 'bhavat || ViP_4,13.53
